mapper.insert: INSERT INTO message (type, status, value, info, lng, lat, timestamp, did) VALUES (#{type}, #{status}, #{value}, #{info}, #{lng}, #{lat}, #{timestamp}, #{did})
mapper.select: SELECT m.info as message, m.timestamp, m.type, m.lng, m.lat, m.status, m.value, d.name as deviceName FROM message m JOIN device d on d.did = m.did WHERE d.uid = #{uid} AND (#{beginTime} IS NULL OR m.timestamp >= #{beginTime}) AND (#{endTime} IS NULL OR m.timestamp <= #{endTime}) LIMIT 100

SELECT m.info as message, m.timestamp, m.type, m.lng, m.lat, m.status, m.value, d.name as deviceName FROM message m JOIN device d on d.did = m.did WHERE d.uid = #{uid} AND d.did = #{did} AND (#{beginTime} IS NULL OR m.timestamp >= #{beginTime}) AND (#{endTime} IS NULL OR m.timestamp <= #{endTime}) ORDER BY m.timestamp DESC

SELECT m.info as message, m.timestamp, m.type, m.lng, m.lat, m.status, m.value, d.name as deviceName FROM message m INNER JOIN (SELECT did, MAX(timestamp) as maxTimestamp FROM message GROUP BY did) as latestMessage ON m.did = latestMessage.did AND m.timestamp = latestMessage.maxTimestamp INNER JOIN device d ON m.did = d.did WHERE d.uid = #{uid}
SELECT d.name as device_name, COUNT(m.mid) as message_count FROM device d LEFT JOIN message m ON d.did = m.did WHERE d.uid = #{uid} GROUP BY d.did ORDER BY message_count DESC LIMIT 10
